Generated Narrative: ValueSet eHDSIAnimalSpeciesWithExceptions

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Exceptional Value
  • Import all the codes that are contained in eHDSI Animal Species

name: EHDSIAnimalSpeciesWithExceptions
title: eHDSI Animal Species with exceptions
description: The Value Set is used to code the animal species of specimen subject (animal of the patient). It also includes exceptional values.
